query: I have an idea for a fitness app that gamifies walking. Can you help me brainstorm features?
Generate a Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the fitness app we discussed.
Research top 3 competitors for gamified fitness apps and summarize their key features.
I want to extract the 'social leaderboard' feature to the sandbox for further refinement.
What are the technical requirements for implementing a real-time chat feature in this app?
Create a 3-month roadmap for the MVP launch of the fitness app.
Review the current plan and identify any potential risks or assumptions we've made.
Suggest a marketing strategy for the initial user acquisition.
